links.title: Apple browser bug could lead to personal data leak
links.description: A vulnerability in the Safari 15 browser allows malicious programs to track people's internet activity and reveal their identity A recently disclosed Apple Safari 15 bug can be used by nefarious sites to extract people's browsing history and obtain their Google ID to collect more personal data, a fraud detector reports.
